eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LAW ENFORCEMENT WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Ellis, KS; AT 02:20 AM ON SEP 28, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 02:20 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: From Kansas Highway Patrol: Avoid 2200 Blk Downing (Hays, KS) Heavy law enforcement presence and activity / surrounding 2202 Downing Avenue (Hays, KS).  Law enforcement has residence surrounded. Please stay indoors and avoid the area. Update will be sent once incident is over.
